EnvironmentUpdateProperties.description: Properties of an environment. These properties can be updated after the resource has been created.

parameters.description: Parameters object for the environment. Can only be updated via create or replace.

EnvironmentPatchProperties.description: Properties of an environment. These properties can be updated via PATCH after the resource has been created.

expirationDate.description: The time the expiration date will be triggered (UTC), after which the environment and associated resources will be deleted.

uri.description: The unique URI of the environment

environmentType.description: The name of the environment type. Cannot be updated after creation.

user.description: The AAD object id of the owner of this Environment.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the environment.

resourceGroupId.description: The identifier of the resource group containing the environment's resources.

catalogName.description: The name of the catalog. Cannot be updated after creation.

environmentDefinitionName.description: The name of the environment definition. Cannot be updated after creation.

error.description: Provisioning error details. Populated only for error states.

values.description: The output is an array of values.
The output is a boolean value.
The output is a number value.
The output is an object value.
The output is a string value.

sensitive.description: Indicates if the value is sensitive.

values.description: The action will delete the environment and associated resources.

EnvironmentNextAction.description: Details about the next run of an action.

scheduledTime.description: The time the action will be triggered (UTC).

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

actionType.description: The action that will be taken.

next.description: Details about the next run of this action.

lastModifiedBy.description: Object Id of the user who last modified the action.

lastModifiedAt.description: time the object was last modified.

EnvironmentListResult.description: Results of the environment list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

CatalogListResult.description: Results of the catalog list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

uri.description: The unique URI of the catalog

EnvironmentDefinitionListResult.description: Results of the environment definition list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

uri.description: The unique URI of the environment definition

id.description: The ID of the environment definition.

description.description: A short description of the environment definition.

parameters.description: Input parameters passed to an environment.

parametersSchema.description: JSON schema defining the parameters object passed to an environment.

templatePath.description: Path to the Environment Definition entrypoint file.

EnvironmentDefinitionParameter.description: Properties of an Environment Definition parameter

default.description: Default value of the parameter

type.description: A string of one of the basic JSON types (number, integer, array, object, boolean, string)

readOnly.description: Whether or not this parameter is read-only.  If true, default should have a value.

required.description: Whether or not this parameter is required

EnvironmentTypeListResult.description: Result of the environment type list operation.

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of results if there are any.

uri.description: The unique URI of the environment type

deploymentTargetId.description: The ID of a subscription or management group that the environment type will be mapped to. The environment's resources will be deployed into this subscription or management group.

status.description: Indicates whether this environment type is enabled for use in this project.

displayName.description: Display name of the environment type.

EnvironmentTypeEnableStatus.description: Indicates whether an environment type is enabled for use in a project.

values.description: The environment type is enabled for use in the project.
The environment type is not enabled for use in the project.

ParameterType.description: The type of data a parameter accepts.

values.description: The parameter accepts an array of values.
The parameter accepts a boolean value.
The parameter accepts an integer value.
The parameter accepts a number value.
The parameter accepts an object value.
The parameter accepts a string value.

nextLink.description: The URL to get the next set of results.

EnvironmentOperation.description: Information about an operation on an environment.

uri.description: The unique URI for the environment operation.

operationId.description: Unique identifier for the environment operation.

kind.description: The kind of operation that occurred.

createdByObjectId.description: The object ID of the actor which initiated the operation.

environmentParameters.description: Parameters object for the environment at the time of the operation.

error.description: Provisioning or operation error details. Populated only for error states.

values.description: The operation represents a deployment.
The operation represents a delete.

EnvironmentOperationStatus.description: The status of an environment operation.

values.description: The operation has not started.
The operation is running.
The operation succeeded.
The operation was canceled.
The operation failed.

EnvironmentDeployOperation.description: Information about a deploy operation on an environment.

EnvironmentDeleteOperation.description: Information about a delete operation on an environment.

EnvironmentDefinitionNameParameter.name: definitionName
EnvironmentDefinitionNameParameter.description: The name of the environment definition

EnvironmentOperationIdParameter.name: operationId
EnvironmentOperationIdParameter.description: The id of the operation on an environment.

EnvironmentActionNameParameter.name: actionName
EnvironmentActionNameParameter.description: The name of an action that will take place on an Environment.

EnvironmentActionDelayUntilParameter.name: until
EnvironmentActionDelayUntilParameter.description: The time to delay the Environment action until.
